items.title: Excellent display on all devices
items.details: Your website will look great on all devices such as smartphones, tablets, and computers.

items.title: Lifetime FREE hosting
items.details: You never have to pay for hosting. I take care of everything for you. Hosting: putting your website online.

items.title: Lifetime FREE domain name
items.details: You never have to pay for a domain name. I take care of everything for you. Domain name: your website address (e.g., www.yourcompany.com).

items.title: Lifetime FREE maintenance and updates
items.details: I always ensure that your website is up-to-date and remains so, so it always functions excellently. You don't have to worry about updates or maintenance.

items.title: Excellent SEO on your website, FREE
items.details: I ensure that your website scores well on Google so you get more visitors. SEO: search engine optimization. This is important for your website to be found on Google and other search engines.

items.title: FREE logo
items.details: You read that right! With a subscription, you receive a free logo from my collection, fully tailored to your wishes.

items.title: Administration & invoices handled by me
items.details: I handle all administration and invoicing for you, such as the website, hosting, and domain name. You don't have to worry about anything.

items.title: 24/7 support
items.details: Do you have questions or comments? You can always contact me. I am happy to help you at no cost.

items.title: Pay annually? No startup costs!
items.details: Yes, you read that right! No startup costs with annual payment. You only pay for the subscription itself.

items.title: Ready in about 5 days
items.details: Your website will be ready in about 5 days.

items.title: Not satisfied? 30-day money-back guarantee
items.details: Not satisfied? No problem, you get your money back within 30 days.
